name: pushoverNotification

metadata.description:
pushoverNotification Sensor


Sends a ntification using the pushover service

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed
Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • token: Pushover api token (we do not recommend to fill in the token as plaintext, use declerative binding in combination with vault)
  • user: The usergroup that will receive the notification
  • message: Message that will be added to the notification
  • title: Title of the notification
